# Scripts

Bundled resources for access-control-auditor skill

- [x] access_control_audit.py: Script to automate the access control auditing process, taking system configuration files as input and generating a report of potential vulnerabilities.
- [x] policy_parser.py: Script to parse IAM policies and ACLs, extracting relevant access control rules for analysis.
- [x] report_generator.py: Script to generate a formatted report of access control audit findings, including severity levels and remediation recommendations.
